headline: Vertiv and Caterpillar Announce Energy Optimization Collaboration to Expand End-to-End Power and Cooling Offerings for AI Data Centers
summary: Vertiv (NYSE: VRT), a global leader in critical digital infrastructure, and Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT), a global leader in power systems, today announced the signing of a strategic undertaking to collaborate on advanced energy optimization solutions for data centers. This initiative will integrate Vertiv's power distribution and cooling portfolio with Caterpillar's, and its subsidiary Solar Turbines', product and expertise in power generation and CCHP (Combined Cooling, Heat and Power) to deli

thumbnail.caption: Vertiv and Caterpillar announce a collaboration to enhance data center efficiency, resiliency and deployment timelines through integrated energy solutions.

headline: Vertiv, Caterpillar Collaborate to Expand Power and Cooling Offerings for Data Centers
summary: Vertiv, a global critical digital infrastructure group, and power systems leader Caterpillar announced the signing of a strategic undertaking to collaborate on advanced energy optimization solutions for data centers. The initiative unveiled November 18 will integrate Vertiv’s power distribution and cooling portfolio with Caterpillar’s, and its subsidiary Solar Turbines’, product and expertise in power generation and CCHP (combined cooling, heat, and power) to deliver pre-designed architectures t

headline: Could Vertiv (VRT) Gain a Competitive Edge in Data Centers With Its Latest Power Partnership?
summary: Vertiv Holdings Co. recently announced a collaboration with Caterpillar Inc. and Solar Turbines to deliver integrated, modular energy and cooling solutions tailored for data centers, aimed at improving deployment speed, efficiency, and on-site power resilience worldwide. This partnership supports Vertiv's Bring Your Own Power & Cooling strategy and addresses growing industry needs for scalable, efficient, and grid-independent data center infrastructure. headline: This Unlikely Stock to Buy Could Be the Best Bet on the Future of the AI Race
summary: Caterpillar is emerging as a surprising winner of the AI infrastructure boom as data-center power demand drives record growth in its Energy & Transportation business.
